# 快速上手

# 介绍

Chrysophoron Drawer AKA ch-drawer 是一个简单的抽屉组件，主要服务于 web

# 安装

npm install ch-drawer --save
or
npm i ch-drawer

# 使用

import Vue from 'vue';
import ChDrawer from 'ch-drawer';
Vue.use(ChDrawer, { zIndex: 1000 });
// zIndex default value is 200

# 示例

# 基本用法

支持四个方向的抽屉弹出方式，支持点击遮罩或按下esc关闭。

# 源码

<template>
  <div class='location'>
    <div class='location-radio__container'>
      <input type='radio'
             id='left'
             value='left'
             v-model="locationPick"
             class='location-radio'></input>
      <label for='left'>左侧弹出</label>
      <input type='radio'
             class='location-radio'
             id='right'
             value='right'
             v-model="locationPick"></input>
      <label for='right'>右侧弹出</label>
      <input type='radio'
             class='location-radio'
             id='top'
             value='top'
             v-model="locationPick"></input>
      <label for='top'>顶部弹出</label>
      <input type='radio'
             class='location-radio'
             id='bottom'
             value='bottom'
             v-model="locationPick"></input>
      <label for='bottom'>底部弹出</label>
    </div>
    <div class='location-button__wrapper'>
      <button class='location-button'
              @click='visible=true'> Try Me</button>
    </div>
    <ch-drawer :location='locationPick'
               :visible.sync='visible'
               :before-close='handleBeforeClose'>
      我在这里
    </ch-drawer>
  </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "ExamplesLocation",
  data() {
    return {
      locationPick: "left",
      visible: false
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleBeforeClose(next) {
      alert("prepare to close");
      next();
    }
  }
};
</script>

# 带有嵌套的抽屉

支持多层嵌套的抽屉弹出使用方式,同时支持头部、内容、底部slot插槽注入

Ch-Drawer

# 源码

<template>
  <div class='nested'>
    <div class='nested-button__wrapper'>
      <button class='location-button'
              @click='visible=true'>Try Me</button>
    </div>
    <ch-drawer :visible.sync='visible'
               area='35%'>
      <div slot='header'
           style="padding:0 1em">
        Ch-Drawer
      </div>
      <div style='padding:1em'>
        <div style='margin-bottom:2em'>
          我是外层的抽屉
        </div>
        <button class='location-button'
                @click='visibleInside=true'>Open Inside</button>
        <ch-drawer :visible.sync='visibleInside'>
          <div>
            <span>I'm inside</span>
            <div>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Rem voluptatum minima tempora totam voluptatem suscipit pariatur, sequi magni cumque ex at inventore voluptate sit alias aperiam eveniet asperiores facere sed.</div>
            <div>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Rem voluptatum minima tempora totam voluptatem suscipit pariatur, sequi magni cumque ex at inventore voluptate sit alias aperiam eveniet asperiores facere sed.</div>
            <div>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Rem voluptatum minima tempora totam voluptatem suscipit pariatur, sequi magni cumque ex at inventore voluptate sit alias aperiam eveniet asperiores facere sed.</div>
            <div>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Rem voluptatum minima tempora totam voluptatem suscipit pariatur, sequi magni cumque ex at inventore voluptate sit alias aperiam eveniet asperiores facere sed.</div>
            <div>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Rem voluptatum minima tempora totam voluptatem suscipit pariatur, sequi magni cumque ex at inventore voluptate sit alias aperiam eveniet asperiores facere sed.</div>
            <div>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Rem voluptatum minima tempora totam voluptatem suscipit pariatur, sequi magni cumque ex at inventore voluptate sit alias aperiam eveniet asperiores facere sed.</div>

          </div>
          <div slot='footer'>
            <button class='location-button'
                    @click='visibleInside=false'>关闭</button>
          </div>
        </ch-drawer>
      </div>

    </ch-drawer>
  </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "ExamplesLocation",
  data() {
    return {
      visibleInside: false,
      visible: false
    };
  }
};
</script>

# API

属性 类型 接受值 描述 默认
visible Boolean 显示/不显示抽屉组件，支持sync属性 false
area String 抽屉组件的覆盖区域，如果弹出方向为左/右，则为水平覆盖，影响width，其余为垂直覆盖，影响height，另外，传入的值应为z% ,如果传入数字请添加px变为字符串
close-visible Boolean 是否显示关闭按钮 true
mask Boolean 是否显示遮罩层 true
blur Boolean 是否模糊根元素 true
destroy-on-close Boolean 是否应该在关闭抽屉后卸载content中的组件，多用于表单和表格获取/更新数据 false
title String 标题字符串，将默认注入header slot -
custom-class String 给抽屉添加一个自定义类 -
location String 'left'/'right'/'top'/'bottom' 抽屉的弹出方向 'left'
escap-on-press Boolean 点击esc是否关闭抽屉 true
escape-on-click Boolean 点击遮罩是否关闭抽屉 true
before-close Function 如果传入了方法，将会在关闭前调用，参数为next调用该函数则关闭抽屉 -
open 抽屉打开时触发 -
opened 抽屉完全打开，并且在动画结束后触发 -
close 抽屉关闭时触发 -
closed 抽屉完全关闭，并且在动画结束后触发 -
header Slot 头部插槽 -
default Slot 内容插槽(默认插槽) -
footer Slot 底部插槽 -
